metadata.description:
*HomePage Plus f eatures*
- Block users: enter the user wallet you want to block, separated by a comma, and they will disappear from your life, for good 🫡 🫡 🫡 
- Tip NEAR: default tip 1 NEAR on each post.
- more to comes...

*Set HomePage Plus as your default homepage here*
Go to: https://near.social/#/mob.near/widget/HomepageEditor
Set default homepage to: cuongdcdev.near/widget/HomepagePlus (u can use other widget too,ocf)
add user id (wallet address) to the "Block List" (bottom right).
Press save and you are done!
